title: 72/276. Follow-up to the report of the Secretary-General on peacebuilding and sustaining peace

paragraphs.1: Welcomes the presentation of the report of the Secretary-General on peacebuilding and sustaining peace, 1 takes note with appreciation of the recommendations and options contained therein, and decides to discuss them further;
paragraphs.2: Invites the relevant United Nations bodies and organs, including the Peacebuilding Commission, to further advance, explore and consider implementation, as appropriate, of the recommendations and options contained in the report of the Secretary-General, in accordance with the established procedures, during the seventy- second and seventy-third sessions of the General Assembly;
paragraphs.3: Requests the Secretary-General to present to the General Assembly, during its seventy-third session, an interim report further elaborating on his recommendations and options, including those on financing for United Nations peacebuilding activities;
paragraphs.4: Also requests the Secretary-General to submit to the General Assembly, during its seventy-fourth session, a detailed report in connection with the next comprehensive review of the United Nations peacebuilding architecture, focusing on continued implementation of resolution 70/262 and progress in the implementation of the recommendations and options contained in his report on peacebuilding and sustaining peace.
